title: Broomcraft Mystic Evasion
description: Broomcraft Mystic Evasion is a horde survival action game where you fly on a magic broom and survive in battle against tons of enemies! Defeat enemies and collect experience points. Level up and become stronger. Learn new spells and develop the spells you have acquired to be able to defeat enemies faster. Face various types of enemies and bosses who try to stop you. Collect coins to unlock new magic brooms, and don't forget to upgrade them to make them faster and more agile. Combine different magical spells, each associated with its own element, and find your winning strategy! There are two game modes available: Level Mode, where you can practice, explore new enemies, and, most importantly, conquer bosses; and Endless Mode, for those who want to challenge themselves against wave after wave of monsters. Good luck in the battle!
